Reference

All functions

Adomako_Ankomah_2017

Multiplicity of infection in Mali using 24-SNP barcode data (Adomako-Ankomah et al., 2017)

Bankole_2018

24-SNP barcode data from two urban cities in Nigeria (Bankole et al., 2018)

Bei_2018

24-SNP barcode data at two time-points in Senegal (Bei et al., 2018)

Briggs_2021

Inferring local and crossborder transmission with human and mobility data, Kanunga District in Southwest Uganda (Briggs et al., 2019)

CI_inc()

Get confidence intervals on incidence data

Chang_2017

SNP data collected from Uganda (Chang et al., 2017)

Charles_2016

24-SNP barcode data showing population structure in Haiti (Charles et al., 2016)

Daniels_2013

24-SNP barcode data showing clonal and epidemic transmission in Senegal (Daniels et al., 2013)

Daniels_2020

24-SNP barcode data from 11 sentinel sites in Haiti (Daniels et al., 2020)

Daniels_2020B

24-SNP barcode data from two trials in Zambia (Daniels et al., 2020)

Daniels_2020C

24-SNP barcode data from Richard Toll, Senegal (Daniels et al., 2020)

EIR_prev_beier1999

Measures of annual EIR and prevalence (Beier et al.,1999)

EIR_prev_hay2005

Measures of annual EIR and prevalence within the same site

Galinsky_2015

24-SNP barcode data showing monogenomic and polygenomic infections in Senegal (Galinsky et al., 2015)

Obaldia_2015

24-SNP barcode data from clonal outbreak in Panama (Obaldia et al., 2015)

PCR_micro_age_whittaker2021

Measures of prevalence by PCR and Microscopy, broken down by age

PCR_micro_full_whittaker2021

Measures of prevalence by PCR and Microscopy

Roh_2019

Microsatellite data across 26 loci, Eswatini (Roh et al., 2019)

SIMPLEGEN

Load system file

Taylor_2017

93-SNP barcode data from Thai-Myanmar border (Taylor et al., 2017)

Taylor_2020

250-SNP barcode reveals connectivity on Colombian-Pacific coast (Taylor et al., 2020)

Tessema_2019

Microsatellite data across 26 loci, Northeast Namibia (Tessema et al., 2019)

check_SIMPLEGEN_loaded()

Check that SIMPLEGEN package has loaded successfully

define_epi_model_parameters()

Define parameters of transmission simulation model

define_epi_sampling_parameters()

Define outputs produced from the transmission model

life_table_Mali()

A life table taken from Mali

plot_flex_distribution()

Generic function for plotting flexible distributions

plot_treatment_seeking()

Plot distribution of treatment seeking in the population

prev_inc_griffin2014

Data on prevalence and incidence broken down by age, used in Griffin et al. 2014 model fit

sim_epi()

Simulate from simple individual-based model

simplegen_file()

Load system file

simplegen_project()

Define new SIMPLEGEN project
